thread.title: A preserved key, a discovered diary and a huge cast: Unforgotten has us hooked
thread.title_full: A preserved key, a discovered diary and a huge cast: Unforgotten has us hooked

title: A preserved key, a discovered diary and a huge cast: Unforgotten has us hooked
text:
A preserved key, a discovered diary and a huge cast: Unforgotten has us hooked A preserved key, a discovered diary and a huge cast: Unforgotten has us hooked 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
If you’re looking for an autumnal British mystery to get stuck into, then Unforgotten might just be the thing to watch while snug on the sofa. Time to cancel all my Thursday night shifts for next 5 weeks #Unforgotten 
— hilary rowell (@hilaryrowell) October 8, 2015 
We’re already anticipating the Goggleboxers’ reactions to the new ITV crime drama which started with the discovery of a skeleton in an old building and sees Nicola Walker and Sanjeev Bhaskar unite as the detectives investigating a cold case murder with help from their forensic colleagues. 
At first all they had to go on was a bag of bones but they soon discovered a preserved key which leads to a wreck of a classic car and, hey presto! a diary which might reveal something about the victim and his killer/s. 
But rewind to the beginning… People were loving the main casting (John Rogers/ITV) 
— Emily Chase (@chasingemily) October 8, 2015 The duo Nicola Walker and Sanjeev Bhaskar is a great idea. #Unforgotten #ITV 
— Thierry Attard (@thierryattard) October 8, 2015 And were aware that there was a big cast How many different characters at in Unforgotten? #Unforgotten
